content: TE 30-22 Cordless rotary hammer Powerful cordless SDS Plus (TE-C) rotary hammer with Active Vibration Reduction and Active Torque Control for concrete drilling and chiseling (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Rotary hammers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Exceptional drilling speed – drills through rebar up to 200% faster than predecessors More run time per charge – drills up to twice as long as comparable SDS Plus rotary hammers thanks to the combination of brushless motor and revolutionary Nuron batteries Versatility – with a wider optimal drilling range and extensive range of chisel bits and hole saws available, TE 30-22 is an extremely versatile tool with a wide range of capabilities for any jobsite Comprehensive safety features – includes Active Torque Control (ATC) to better protect you from uncontrolled spinning if the bit jams Uncompromised cordless performance – our most powerful and versatile SDS Plus cordless rotary hammer drill ever, still weighing just 12.6 lbs (including B 22-255 battery) Applications Drilling holes for rebar doweling Virtually dust-free drilling (TE DRS-C or TE DRS-D vacuum cleaner connector required) Light-duty chiseling – such as tile scraping, channel cleaning and surface correction Setting anchors and driving screws (optional TE-C bit holder required) Drilling anchor holes and through-holes in concrete and masonry (recommended diameter range 3/8” to 1-1/8) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 8.6 lb. Optimum Hammer drilling range: 13/32 - 31/32 in Single impact energy: 2.8 ft-lbs Technical Data | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 8.6 lb | Optimum Hammer drilling range | 13/32 - 31/32 in | Single impact energy | 2.8 ft-lbs | Hammer drilling diameter range | 3/16 - 1-3/32 in | Hammer drilling RPM | 777 rpm | Full hammering frequency | 4500 impacts/minute | Functionality | Active Torque Control (ATC), Active Vibration Reduction (AVR), Chiseling, Chipping, Depth gauge, Removable chuck, Reverse mode, Torque clutch | Triaxial vibration for chiseling into concrete | 8.5 m/s² | 1 | A-weighted emission sound power level | 102 dB (A) | 2 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 94 dB (A) | 3 | Dust removal system available | TE DRS-D, TE DRS-C | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3951587 - TE 30-22 Performance Package - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 30-22 QN Cordl. combihammer - 1x Depth gauge - 1x TE 30-22 Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x TE-CX 3/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 1/4-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 5/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 3/8-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX(5) 1/2-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX(5) 5/8-8 Hammer drill bit - 1x Flat chisel TE-CX FM 18 - 1x Pointed chisel TE-CX SM 18 - 2253115 - Cordless Rotary Hammer TE 30-22 Case - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 30-22 QN Cordl. combihammer - 1x Depth gauge - 1x TE 30-22 Tool case assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml
